description:
"μ`s" is chosen as the group`s name, and Honoka and her friends complete their debut song. Their recognition grows at school, and when their hard work is rewarded by a slight increase in their idol ranking, the three are overjoyed. The day of the concert arrives. Honoka and her friends get ready for the event with the help of their classmates. Thinking back on their days of practice, Honoka and her friends renew their resolve. The first concert of μ`s begins, but...
Source: crunchyroll
